newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Forecast Portuguese bond spreads vs Bunds/Bonos.
newsitem.headline: Forecast Portuguese bond spreads vs Bunds/Bonos.

text.p: The following is a daily forecast
of yield spreads of Portuguese fixed rate bonds (OTs) against
Spread Feb 2007 OTs vs Jul 2007 Bund 50/51.4/55 vs 50 bp
Feb 2007 OTs vs Mar 2007 Bono -16/-18.6/-20 vs -20 bp
Feb 2007 OTs vs Mar 1999 OTs 112/113/115 vs 112 bp
Jun 97 future BPDOTM7 (0758 GMT) +0.05 points to 108.91
Main factors that could influence trade:
Ten-year Portuguese bonds, which are showing record low yield spreads against Bunds of around 50 basis points, are expected to track Bunds very closely. Shorter bonds expected to be well-supported.
